channel.title: How do you make a safezone?
channel.description: I read slytes tut but it was only for varrock...

item.title: How do you make a safezone?
item.dc:creator: @Born2kill_92 Liamssword (Born2kill 92)
item.description:
@Born2kill_92 wrote:

[quote=“F00L I K0, post:2, topic:104553”]Purpose: How To Make A Safe Zone

Difficulty: 2

Assumed Knowledge: Have a normal thought process

Server Base: PimpScape

Classes Modified: Client

Procedure
Step 1: Search For:

public boolean nonWild() {

Step 2: Mine looks like this:

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||(absX >=3459 && absX <=3510 && absY >=9479 && absY <=9519 )||(absX >=3253 && absX <=3254 && absY >=3423 && absY <=3431 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Step 3: Its in this form:

[code](absX >=Bottom left point && absX <=Bottom right point && absY >=Top right point && <=Top left point)||

The || is important because it seperates the different areas. and this area that you are making needs to be a square.[/code]

NOTE: I didnt post this so dont.
Credits: To Original Poster.[/quote]
rep++ thank you so much for reading.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a safezone?

Purpose: How To Make A Safe Zone

public boolean nonWild() {

Step 2: Mine looks like this:

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||(absX >=3459 && absX <=3510 && absY >=9479 && absY <=9519 )||(absX >=3253 && absX <=3254 && absY >=3423 && absY <=3431 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

[code](absX >=Bottom left point && absX <=Bottom right point && absY >=Top right point && <=Top left point)||

The || is important because it seperates the different areas. and this area that you are making needs to be a square.[/code]
